index.title: Getting Things Done (GTD)
index.description: Capture → Clarify → Organize → Reflect → Engage

index.title: The Pomodoro Technique
index.description: Set Goal → Work (25m) → Short Break (5m) → Repeat x4 → Long Break

index.title: Eisenhower Matrix
index.description: Categorize Urgency/Importance → Do → Decide → Delegate → Delete

index.title: Eat The Frog
index.description: Identify Hardest Task → Do First Thing → Move to Smaller Tasks

index.title: Time Blocking
index.description: List Tasks → Estimate Time → Assign Calendar Slots → Execute

index.title: Kanban
index.description: Backlog → To Do → In Progress → Review → Done

index.title: The 2-Minute Rule
index.description: Task < 2 mins? → Do Immediately → Task > 2 mins? → Defer/Delegate

index.title: Zero-Based Scheduling
index.description: List Available Hours → Assign Every Hour a Function → 0 Hours Remain

index.title: Biological Prime Time
index.description: Track Energy 1 Week → Identify Peaks → Schedule Deep Work → Admin in Troughs

index.title: Batching
index.description: Group Similar Tasks → Schedule Block → Execute Consecutively

index.title: Must/Should/Want
index.description: List Tasks → Label 'Must' → Label 'Should' → Label 'Want'

index.title: Ivy Lee Method
index.description: List 6 Tasks → Prioritize 1-6 → Start #1 → Work until Done → Repeat

index.title: Seinfeld Strategy
index.description: Pick Habit → Complete Daily → Mark X on Calendar → Don't Break Chain

index.title: Inbox Zero
index.description: Process Item → Delete? → Delegate? → Respond (<2m)? → Defer?

index.title: Pareto Analysis (80/20)
index.description: List Inputs → Identify Top 20% → Focus Solely on Top 20%

index.title: The 5 Whys
index.description: State Problem → Ask 'Why?' → Answer → Ask 'Why?' again → Repeat 5x → Root Cause

index.title: Fishbone Diagram
index.description: Define Effect → Draw Spine → Categorize Causes (Man/Machine/etc) → Brainstorm Sub-causes

index.title: DMAIC (Six Sigma)
index.description: Define → Measure → Analyze → Improve → Control

index.title: 8D (Eight Disciplines)
index.description: Form Team → Describe Problem → Containment → Root Cause → Corrective Action → Validate → Prevent → Recognize

index.title: PDCA (Deming Cycle)
index.description: Plan (Hypothesize) → Do (Test) → Check (Analyze) → Act (Implement)

index.title: TRIZ
index.description: Define Specific Problem → Match to General Problem → Find General Solution → Adapt to Specific

index.title: Cynefin Framework
index.description: Sense → Categorize → Respond (Simple) OR Sense → Analyze → Respond (Complicated)

index.title: First Principles
index.description: Deconstruct to Truths → Question Assumptions → Reconstruct Solution

index.title: Inversion
index.description: Define Goal → Define Failure Mode → Avoid Failure Steps

index.title: Rubber Duck Debugging
index.description: Get Duck → Explain Code Line-by-Line → Self-Correct

index.title: Kepner-Tregoe Matrix
index.description: Situation Appraisal → Problem Analysis → Decision Analysis → Potential Problem Analysis

index.title: A3 Problem Solving
index.description: Background → Current Condition → Goal → Root Cause → Countermeasures → Confirmation → Follow-up

index.title: CATWOE
index.description: Customers → Actors → Transformation → Worldview → Owners → Environment

index.title: OODA Loop
index.description: Observe → Orient → Decide → Act

index.title: SWOT Analysis
index.description: Analyze Internal (Strengths/Weaknesses) → Analyze External (Opportunities/Threats) → Match

index.title: Regret Minimization
index.description: Project to Age 80 → Ask 'Will I Regret This?' → Minimize Regret

index.title: SPADE
index.description: Setting → People → Alternatives → Decide → Explain

index.title: WRAP
index.description: Widen Options → Reality Test → Attain Distance → Prepare to be Wrong

index.title: Blue Ocean Strategy
index.description: Eliminate Factors → Reduce Factors → Raise Factors → Create Factors (ERRC)

index.title: Porter's Five Forces
index.description: Supplier Power → Buyer Power → Rivalry → Substitution → New Entry

index.title: PESTLE Analysis
index.description: Political → Economic → Social → Technological → Legal → Environmental

index.title: Eisenhardt's Options
index.description: Develop Option A → Develop Option B → Develop Option C → Compare Trade-offs → Select

index.title: RICE Score
index.description: Calculate (Reach × Impact × Confidence) / Effort → Sort by Score

index.title: Scenario Planning
index.description: Identify Drivers → Create Uncertainties Matrix → Develop 4 Scenarios → Strategy for Each

index.title: Pre-Mortem
index.description: Assume Failure → Brainstorm Reasons → Create Prevention Plan → Execute

index.title: BATNA
index.description: Determine Best Alternative → Set Reservation Price → Negotiate

index.title: Cost-Benefit Analysis
index.description: List Costs → List Benefits → Assign Values → Calculate Net

index.title: Design Thinking
index.description: Empathize → Define → Ideate → Prototype → Test

index.title: SCAMPER
index.description: Substitute → Combine → Adapt → Modify → Put to use → Eliminate → Reverse

index.title: Six Thinking Hats
index.description: White (Data) → Red (Emotion) → Black (Caution) → Yellow (Optimism) → Green (Creative) → Blue (Control)

index.title: Lateral Thinking
index.description: Select Focus → Generate Provocation → Move to New Idea

index.title: Crazy 8s
index.description: Fold Paper 8x → Sketch 8 Ideas (8 mins) → Review

index.title: Double Diamond
index.description: Discover (Diverge) → Define (Converge) → Develop (Diverge) → Deliver (Converge)

index.title: Disney Strategy
index.description: The Dreamer → The Realist → The Critic

index.title: Snowflake Method
index.description: One Sentence → One Paragraph → Character Sheets → Scene List → First Draft

index.title: Hero's Journey
index.description: Call to Adventure → Threshold → Challenges → Abyss → Transformation → Return

index.title: Synectics
index.description: Identify Problem → Make Strange Familiar → Make Familiar Strange → Force Connections

index.title: Scientific Method
index.description: Observe → Question → Hypothesize → Experiment → Analyze → Conclusion

index.title: Feynman Technique
index.description: Choose Concept → Teach to Child → Identify Gaps → Review Source → Simplify

index.title: Socratic Method
index.description: Make Claim → Ask Probing Questions → Reveal Contradictions → Refine Claim

index.title: SQ3R
index.description: Survey → Question → Read → Recite → Review

index.title: Spaced Repetition
index.description: Learn → Review (1 day) → Review (3 days) → Review (1 week) → Review (1 month)

index.title: Bloom's Taxonomy
index.description: Remember → Understand → Apply → Analyze → Evaluate → Create

index.title: Ladder of Inference
index.description: Data → Select Data → Interpret → Assume → Conclude → Believe → Act

index.title: Hanlon's Razor
index.description: Observe Negative Outcome → Question Malice → Default to Incompetence

index.title: Double-Loop Learning
index.description: Action → Result → Mismatch? → Question Assumptions → New Action

index.title: Zettelkasten
index.description: Fleeting Notes → Permanent Notes (One Idea) → Link to Existing → Review Connections

index.title: Scrum
index.description: Backlog → Sprint Planning → Sprint (Standups) → Review → Retrospective

index.title: Waterfall
index.description: Requirements → Design → Implementation → Verification → Maintenance

index.title: TDD
index.description: Write Fail Test → Write Code → Pass Test → Refactor

index.title: DevOps Cycle
index.description: Plan → Code → Build → Test → Release → Deploy → Operate → Monitor

index.title: Lean Startup
index.description: Build (MVP) → Measure (Data) → Learn (Pivot/Persevere)

index.title: Non-Violent Comm.
index.description: Observe (No Judgment) → Identify Feeling → Identify Need → Make Request

index.title: CBT Cycle
index.description: Trigger → Automatic Thought → Emotion → Behavior → Challenge Thought

index.title: Crucial Conversations
index.description: Start with Heart → Learn to Look → Make it Safe → State Path → Explore Others

index.title: Grief Cycle
index.description: Denial → Anger → Bargaining → Depression → Acceptance

index.title: Transactional Analysis
index.description: Identify Ego State (Parent/Adult/Child) → Identify Transaction → Shift to Adult

index.title: Active Listening
index.description: Listen → Pause → Paraphrase → Confirm Understanding

index.title: Radical Candor
index.description: Care Personally + Challenge Directly → Feedback

index.title: Win-Win Negotiation
index.description: Separate People from Problem → Focus on Interests → Invent Options → Use Objective Criteria

index.title: PID Controller
index.description: Measure → Calculate Error → Apply Correction → Loop

index.title: Theory of Constraints
index.description: Identify Constraint → Exploit → Subordinate → Elevate → Loop

index.title: The Flywheel Effect
index.description: Applied Effort → Build Momentum → Breakthrough → Reduced Effort → Loop

index.title: Kaizen
index.description: Standardize → Measure → Compare → Innovate → Standardize (Loop)

index.title: The Habit Loop
index.description: Cue (Trigger) → Routine (Behavior) → Reward → Craving (Loop)

index.title: Positive Feedback
index.description: Event A → Produces B → Amplifies A → Exponential Growth

index.title: Negative Feedback
index.description: Event A → Produces B → Reduces A → Stability

index.title: The Hook Model
index.description: Trigger → Action → Variable Reward → Investment → Trigger (Loop)

index.title: Boyd's E-M Theory
index.description: Energy State → Trade for Position/Speed → Regain Energy → Loop

index.title: Triple-Loop Learning
index.description: Result → Action (Single) → Assumptions (Double) → Identity (Triple)

index.title: Effectuation
index.description: Means → Affordable Loss → Contingencies → New Means → Loop

index.title: Decision Tree
index.description: Node → Branch A (Prob X) / Branch B (Prob Y) → Outcome → Value

index.title: Binary Search
index.description: Sort List → Pick Middle → Target < Middle? (Left) : Target > Middle? (Right)

index.title: Minimax Algorithm
index.description: Look Ahead → Maximize My Gain → Minimize Opponent Gain → Select

index.title: Fault Tree Analysis
index.description: Undesired Event → Logic Gate (OR/AND) → Lower Events → Root Causes

index.title: Event Tree Analysis
index.description: Initiating Event → System A Works? (Yes/No) → System B Works? (Yes/No) → Consequence

index.title: START Triage
index.description: Walking? (Green) → Breathing? (No=Black/Yes=Red) → Pulse? (Red) → Cap Refill?

index.title: Genetic Algorithm
index.description: Init Pop → Evaluate Fitness → Select → Crossover/Mutate → New Gen → Loop

index.title: Monte Carlo Sim
index.description: Define Domain → Generate Random Inputs → Loop x10k → Aggregate → Probability

index.title: If-Then-Else
index.description: Condition Met? → True Path ↔ Condition Failed? → False Path

index.title: Switch/Case
index.description: Input Variable → Case 1? → Case 2? → Case 3? → Default

index.title: Recursion
index.description: Function Call → Base Case Met? (Return) : Loop Deeper (Call Self)

index.title: STRIDE
index.description: Inspect Flow → Branch: Spoofing? Tampering? Repudiation? Info Disclosure? DoS?

index.title: Spiral Model
index.description: Objectives → Risks → Develop/Test → Plan Next → Loop (Expand)

index.title: Hermeneutic Circle
index.description: Understand Part → Understand Whole → Re-interpret Part → Re-interpret Whole → Loop

index.title: Bayesian Updating
index.description: Prior Belief → New Evidence → Likelihood → Posterior Belief (New Prior) → Loop

index.title: Design Sprint
index.description: Map (Mon) → Sketch (Tue) → Decide (Wed) → Prototype (Thu) → Test (Fri)

index.title: Gartner Hype Cycle
index.description: Trigger → Peak Expectations → Trough Disillusionment → Slope Enlightenment → Plateau

index.title: Product Life Cycle
index.description: Intro → Growth → Maturity → Saturation → Decline → Extension/Death

index.title: Transtheoretical Model
index.description: Pre-contemplation → Contemplation → Preparation → Action → Maintenance → Relapse (Loop)

index.title: Kolb's Learning
index.description: Experience → Reflection → Conceptualization → Experimentation → Loop

index.title: Gibbs' Cycle
index.description: Description → Feelings → Evaluation → Analysis → Action Plan → Loop

index.title: Newton-Raphson
index.description: Guess Root → Calculate Tangent → Find Intercept → New Guess → Loop

index.title: Growth Hacking
index.description: Analyze Data → Ideate → Prioritize (ICE) → Test → Analyze → Loop

index.title: The 'V' Model
index.description: Reqs (Down) → Design (Down) → Code → Unit Test (Up) → System Test (Up)

index.title: RACI Matrix
index.description: Task → Responsible? → Accountable? → Consulted? → Informed?

index.title: Situational Leadership
index.description: Diagnose Level → Directing? → Coaching? → Supporting? → Delegating?

index.title: Cynefin (Logic)
index.description: Simple (Categorize) → Complicated (Analyze) → Complex (Probe) → Chaotic (Act)

index.title: Swiss Cheese Model
index.description: Hazard → Layer 1 (Hole?) → Layer 2 (Hole?) → Layer 3 (Hole?) → Accident

index.title: Balanced Scorecard
index.description: Financial ↔ Customer ↔ Internal Process ↔ Learning/Growth (Loop)

index.title: McKinsey 7S
index.description: Strategy ↔ Structure ↔ Systems ↔ Shared Values ↔ Style ↔ Staff ↔ Skills

index.title: Critical Path Method
index.description: List Tasks → Define Dependencies → Calculate Longest Path → Identify Float

index.title: PERT
index.description: Task → (Optimistic + 4*Likely + Pessimistic) / 6 → Weighted Avg

index.title: 5S System
index.description: Sort → Set in Order → Shine → Standardize → Sustain (Loop)

index.title: MapReduce
index.description: Map (Split/Parallel) → Shuffle (Sort) → Reduce (Aggregate)

index.title: Git Flow
index.description: Main → Develop → Feature Branch (Loop) → Release → Merge Main

index.title: Hegelian Dialectic
index.description: Thesis → Antithesis (Conflict) → Synthesis (Resolution) → Loop

index.title: The Work
index.description: Is it true? → Can you know? → Reaction? → Who without thought? → Turnaround

index.title: Flow State Cycle
index.description: Struggle (Load) → Release (Disengage) → Flow (Peak) → Recovery → Loop

index.title: Maslow's Hierarchy
index.description: Physio Met? → Safety Met? → Love Met? → Esteem Met? → Self-Act

index.title: ABCDE Model
index.description: Activating Event → Belief → Consequence → Disputation → Effect

index.title: WOOP
index.description: Wish → Outcome → Obstacle → Plan (If Obstacle -> Then Action)

index.title: Kübler-Ross Loop
index.description: Denial → Anger → Bargaining → Depression → Acceptance

index.title: Self-Fulfilling Prophecy
index.description: Belief → Action → Impact Others → Others' Belief → Others' Action → Reinforce

index.title: Imposter Syndrome
index.description: Task → Anxiety → Over-prep/Procrastinate → Success → Discount → Loop

index.title: ETL Process
index.description: Extract (Source) → Transform (Clean) → Load (Warehouse) → Analyze

index.title: Saga Pattern
index.description: Service A → Success? (Next) : Fail? (Compensate A/Undo)

index.title: Red-Green-Refactor
index.description: Write Red Test (Fail) → Write Code (Pass) → Refactor → Loop

index.title: Chaos Engineering
index.description: Steady State → Introduce Turbulence → Observe System → Improve → Loop

index.title: Pub/Sub
index.description: Publisher → Message → Topic → Subscriber A (Parallel) / Subscriber B (Parallel)

index.title: Circuit Breaker
index.description: Request → Failures > Threshold? → Open Circuit (Block) → Timeout → Half-Open (Test)

index.title: MVC
index.description: User Action → Controller → Model Update → View Update → User

index.title: OAuth 2.0
index.description: Request → Auth Server → Login → Auth Code → Token Exchange → Resource

index.title: CAP Theorem
index.description: Consistency ↔ Availability ↔ Partition Tolerance (Pick 2)

index.title: DIKW Pyramid
index.description: Data → Information → Knowledge → Wisdom

index.title: 5 M's
index.description: Problem → Man? → Machine? → Material? → Method? → Management?

index.title: Bow Tie Analysis
index.description: Fault Tree (Cause) → Event (Knot) → Event Tree (Consequence)

index.title: FMEA

index.title: O-Ring Theory
index.description: Component A (1.0) × Component B (0.9) × Component C (0.9) = System (0.81)

index.title: Kano Model
index.description: Basic Needs (Must) → Performance (Linear) → Delighters (Wow)

index.title: Value Stream Mapping
index.description: Current State → Identify Waste → Future State → Plan

index.description: Today → Drivers → Future A / Future B / Future C → Strategies

index.description: Blue Team (Defend) ↔ Red Team (Attack) → Feedback Loop

index.description: Define Classes → Add Attributes → Add Methods → Define Relationships → Inheritance

index.description: Trigger → Event 1 → Event 2 → Event 3 → Outcome → Prevent

index.title: Neural Network Training
index.description: Initialize Weights → Forward Pass → Calculate Loss → Backward Pass (Backpropagation) → Update Weights → Repeat

index.title: Transformer Architecture
index.description: Input Embedding → Positional Encoding → Multi-Head Attention → Add & Norm → Feed Forward → Add & Norm → Output

index.title: Reinforcement Learning
index.description: Observe State → Select Action (Policy) → Receive Reward → Update Q-Table → Explore/Exploit → Loop

index.title: Attention Mechanism
index.description: Query → Key → Value → Similarity Score → Softmax → Weighted Sum → Context Vector

index.title: GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks)
index.description: Generator Creates → Discriminator Judges → Real/Fake Decision → Backprop Both → Adversarial Training

index.title: Transfer Learning
index.description: Pre-trained Model → Freeze Layers → Add Custom Head → Fine-tune Top Layers → Train on New Data

index.title: Data Augmentation Pipeline
index.description: Load Image → Random Crop → Random Flip → Color Jitter → Normalize → Batch → Train

index.title: Gradient Descent
index.description: Initialize Parameters → Calculate Gradient → Update Parameters → Check Convergence → Loop

index.title: Convolutional Neural Network
index.description: Input Image → Conv Layer → ReLU → Pooling → Flatten → Dense → Softmax → Classification

index.title: Recurrent Neural Network
index.description: Input Sequence → Hidden State → Process Token → Update State → Next Token → Loop

index.title: LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory)
index.description: Input → Forget Gate → Input Gate → Cell State Update → Output Gate → Hidden State

index.title: Encoder-Decoder
index.description: Encode Input → Context Vector → Decode → Generate Output → Attention Bridge

index.title: Beam Search
index.description: Start Token → Generate K Candidates → Score → Keep Top K → Expand → Repeat → Best Path

index.title: Batch Normalization
index.description: Batch Input → Calculate Mean/Variance → Normalize → Scale & Shift → Output

index.title: Dropout Regularization
index.description: Forward Pass → Randomly Drop Neurons → Train → Test (All Active) → Prevent Overfitting

index.title: Adam Optimizer
index.description: Gradient → First Moment (Momentum) → Second Moment → Bias Correction → Parameter Update

index.title: Cross Validation
index.description: Split Data K-Folds → Train on K-1 → Validate on 1 → Rotate → Average Performance

index.title: Early Stopping
index.description: Train Model → Monitor Validation Loss → Patience Counter → Stop if No Improvement → Best Model

index.title: Hyperparameter Tuning
index.description: Define Search Space → Random/Grid Search → Train → Evaluate → Select Best → Repeat

index.title: Model Ensembling
index.description: Train Multiple Models → Predictions → Voting/Averaging → Final Prediction

index.title: Feature Engineering
index.description: Raw Data → Extract Features → Select Important → Transform → Normalize → Model Input

index.title: Embedding Layer
index.description: Token ID → Lookup Table → Dense Vector → Positional Encoding → Model Input

index.title: Autoencoder
index.description: Encode → Bottleneck (Latent Space) → Decode → Reconstruction Loss → Train

index.title: Diffusion Model
index.description: Add Noise (Forward) → Learn Reverse → Denoise Step-by-Step → Generate Sample

index.title: CLIP (Vision-Language)
index.description: Image Encoder → Text Encoder → Contrastive Learning → Shared Embedding Space

index.title: RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)
index.description: Query → Retrieve Documents → Embed Context → Generate Response → LLM Output

index.title: Chain of Thought
index.description: Problem → Step 1 → Step 2 → ... → Step N → Final Answer

index.title: Few-Shot Learning
index.description: Task Description → Example 1 → Example 2 → Example 3 → Your Turn → Response

index.title: Constitutional AI
index.description: Generate Response → Self-Critique → Revise → Principle Alignment → Final Output

index.title: RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback)
index.description: Generate → Human Ranks → Train Reward Model → PPO Training → Aligned Model

index.title: Active Learning
index.description: Label Small Sample → Train Model → Find Uncertain Examples → Human Labels → Retrain → Loop

index.title: Curriculum Learning
index.description: Easy Examples → Medium Examples → Hard Examples → Progressive Training

index.title: Knowledge Distillation
index.description: Teacher Model → Soft Labels → Student Model → Match Distributions → Compressed Model

index.title: Pruning
index.description: Train Full Model → Identify Important Weights → Remove Low-Magnitude → Fine-tune → Smaller Model

index.title: Quantization
index.description: FP32 Weights → INT8 Conversion → Calibration → Quantized Model → Faster Inference

index.title: Model Deployment
index.description: Export Model → ONNX/TensorRT → Container → Load Balancer → Serve → Monitor

index.title: A/B Testing for Models
index.description: Model A → 50% Traffic → Model B → 50% Traffic → Compare Metrics → Winner

index.title: Feature Store
index.description: Raw Data → Feature Engineering → Store → Serve (Train/Inference) → Version Control

index.title: Model Monitoring
index.description: Production Model → Log Predictions → Detect Drift → Alert → Retrain Trigger

index.title: Continuous Training
index.description: New Data → Trigger → Retrain → Validate → Deploy → Monitor → Loop

index.title: Shadow Deployment
index.description: New Model → Mirror Production → Compare Results → No User Impact → Validation

index.title: Multi-Task Learning
index.description: Shared Layers → Task-Specific Heads → Joint Training → Transfer Knowledge

index.title: Meta-Learning
index.description: Learn to Learn → Inner Loop (Task) → Outer Loop (Meta) → Fast Adaptation

index.title: Neural Architecture Search
index.description: Search Space → Train Candidates → Evaluate → Select Best → Evolve

index.title: Explainable AI (SHAP)
index.description: Model Prediction → SHAP Values → Feature Importance → Visualization → Interpretation

index.title: Adversarial Training
index.description: Generate Adversarial Examples → Train on Both → Robust Model

index.title: Self-Supervised Learning
index.description: Unlabeled Data → Create Pretext Task → Train → Fine-tune → Downstream Task

index.title: Contrastive Learning
index.description: Augment Sample → Positive Pairs → Negative Pairs → Contrastive Loss → Representations

index.title: Prompt Engineering
index.description: System Prompt → User Input → Few-Shot Examples → Instructions → LLM Response

index.title: Agent Loop
index.description: Observe → Think (Reasoning) → Act (Tool Use) → Observe Result → Loop

index.title: ReAct Pattern
index.description: Thought → Action → Observation → Thought → Action → ... → Answer
